nodes.text: The Andelm IV gangster Jaum owned a wheeled battle droid  that was used to quell trouble among his slave miners in the Andelm beetle caverns. It was a wheeled red battle droid with two large wheels around a central chassis. The chassis had two sets of laser cannons on each arm. During a mission to help the local girl Zarro, her father Arrax, and the other miners, the Wookiee Chewbacca fought this droid and disabled it with an improvised rod.
